        • Plot Lag-CRP for a single subject

    Plot Lag-CRP for a single subjectÂ¶

    This example plots a Lag-CRP as described in Kahana et al (1996). Given the recall of a stimulus in position n, this plot shows the probability of recalling stimuli in neighboring stimulus positions (n+/-5).

    # Code source: Andrew Heusser
# License: MIT

#import
import quail

#load data
egg = quail.load_example_data()

#analysis
analyzed_data = quail.analyze(egg, analysis='lagcrp', listgroup=['average']*16)

#plot
quail.plot(analyzed_data, title='Lag-CRP')

    Total running time of the script: ( 0 minutes 1.920 seconds)

    Download Python source code: plot_lagcrp.py
    Download Jupyter notebook: plot_lagcrp.ipynb
